name: The legend of the Wall man
name_original: The legend of the Wall man
description:
This game is kinda a parody of other horror games where there is only one AI who always knows where you are, and you have to collect a determined amount of items.

Story i guess:

You were walking in the wood when you found a wall.

there was nothing especial about the wall so you just ignored it.

but then you were knoked unconscious by something hidden in the woods.

Now you must escape the wall man's lair by collecting all of is magical bricks.

controlls:

wasd: move

mouse: look around

shift: run
